context: Hey. So what's your favorite movie genre?
I love fantasy movies. I really like the Harry Potter series. Could you recommend movies like them?
I've seen that. It is pretty good. Can you recommend fantasy for someone a little older?
I also liked Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides (2011)
I haven't seen that one but I did see the first one Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003) . Is it as good?
Better. It's darker. Ian McShane is in it and he's like the best villain ever.
I'll have to see it for sure! Thank you!
entity: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides (2011)
Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)
resp: Check out Into the Woods (2014) too. It was surpisingly good.
